features: Impossibly slick formula fights nicks, irritation and razor burn
Gives you a close, comfortable shave

body.description: Style Name:Sage & Citrus | Size:2 Count Our ultra-slick original formula combined with our exceptional crisp Sage and Citrus scent, inspired by the Pacific Coast.Cremo is an exceptional shave cream. Why? Many shave "creams" and gels are foamy formulas full of air - not the best lubricant. Cremo requires one unusually thin, foam-free layer. It's concentrated against your skin, not in a cloud that gets scraped down the drain. Cremo contains unique molecules that become impossibly slick when mixed with water, so your blade can glide effortlessly over skin. You'll enjoy a clean, comfortable shave and astonishingly smooth skin while fighting nicks, razor burn and irritation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Astonishing performance, superior ingredients and dramatic results. Just think of a barbershop and the people who work there. There's pride, professionalism and passion That's the feeling we've captured in every Barber Grade Product. Products we've created with astonishingly high standards - to meet your standards. Not the easy way. Not the cheapest way. The Cremo way. Cremo Barber Grade Shave Cream Original Formula Sage & Citrus Scent Fight Razor Burn Are you tired of the razor burn that comes with shaving? We were too. That's why we created Cremo Shave Cream. It's uniquely formulated to give you a close, comfortable shave without the burn, no matter what type of razor you use. How? With its rich, concentrated formula that's packed with ultra-slick molecules so almost any blade can glide effortlessly over your skin. You get a close, comfortable shave, every time. Gives you a close, comfortable shave Impossibly slick formula Leaves skin astonishingly smooth Original Formula, Sage & Citrus Scent

Cremo Barber Grade Shave Cream A close shave with virtually any blade Cremo Barber Grade Shave Cream creates an ultra-slick surface so your blade can glide effortlessly over skin. No matter what kind of blade you use. Fights nicks, razor burn and skin irritation Cremo is an exceptional shave cream. Why? Many shave creams and gels are filled with air. Not exactly the best lubricant. Cremo is concentrated with unique molecules that become impossibly slick when mixed with water. You'll enjoy a clean, comfortable shave and astonishingly smooth skin while fighting nicks, razor burn and irritation. Variety of uncommon scents From refreshing Silver Water & Birch to the energizing blend of Sage & Citrus, Cremo's great-smelling scents make a comfortable and enjoyable shave experience even better.

Original Formula Classic Cooling Formula Refreshing Mint Original Formula Sandalwood Original Formula Sage & Citrus Original Formula Silver Water & Birch Original Formula Reserve Blend Scent Subtle citrus Peppermint, menthol, tea tree Woodsy, masculine Invigorating sage and citrus Clean, sophisticated, fresh Sophisticated, masculine scent Fights nicks and razor burn ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Available sizes 1 oz, 3 oz, 6 oz 6 oz 6 oz 6 oz 6 oz 6 oz Works with virtually any blade ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I tested a bunch of shaving creams, and this was the hands down winner.
reviews.reviewText: I tried a wide variety of shaving creams - some were very expensive, others were cheap. By far, this was my favorite. It is just the right thickness, and it works great. The scent is nice as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I don't know why I like it...I just do.
reviews.reviewText: Love the scent. I use a bit more than it claims you need, but if I don't, I don't feel like I get as good a shave. I'm not sure about the "activates with water" claim. Don't they all? I mean, have you ever tried to put Barbasol on a dry face?Still though, love the product. Love the scents. Just a tad pricey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: It has a nice scent. Very slippery stuff for a good shave. There's only one thing I don't like. The tube says to use an "almond size" amount for a shave. The Cremo doesn't lather up very well so an "almond" amount leaves just a thin film on the the face that is hard to even see. I ended up using 2 "almonds" and that worked better. The tube says it will last 3 months but it was more like six weeks for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sage & Citrus smells great
reviews.reviewText: Cremo brand shave creme is a truly outstanding product. I'm amazed at how little is needed (instructions say "almond" sized amount). Sage & Citrus smells fantastic and it sounds strange to say that I often look forward to shaving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells manly & gets the shave close and smooth to the skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is amazing and it doesn't foam up.
reviews.reviewText: I switched to Cremo brand years ago because I absolutely hated foaming shaving creams in aluminum cans. They rust, you get way too much product, and I felt like it was effecting my ability to get all the hair as close to the skin as possible.This stuff just needs a bit of water and it spreads across your skin in a nice layer. It also leaves my skin moisturized, and I can really tell around my armpits that the level of moisture helps reduce any necessary after care for ingrown hairs or razor burn.This scent in particular is my absolute favorite. It's slightly masculine, but I think it is also subtle enough that ladies can wear it as well without smelling like full on dude. I've tried all scents in store except lavender, and that's mostly because I dislike the scent of lavender.Over-all, I would highly recommend to any person needing shaving cream for whatever reason.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and smells awesome
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing, lathers up fast, very slick...good lubricity. The lather is not very rich though and the bubbles in the foam are big and loose and don't offer much cushion. If you are accustomed to a rich thick lather like you get from a premium milled shave soap then this might not be for you. However, this lathers up with much less effort, is less messy, and a lot more slick. So if you like more glide and don't mind less cushion this is good stuff a little goes a long way too so this 2 pack will last me a while. I mostly bought it because I had the Cremo body wash of the same scent, but after using it a month I like it a lot even though it's z little different than the Crabtree and Evelyn or Colonel Conk shave soaps I am used to. For a real treat try what some call uber-lather by mixing shave soap, shave cream, and a few drops of vegetable glycerine. Best of all worlds in one shave.
